title: Crashes, Big-Name Absences Fuel Debate Over Super-Sized Strade Bianche Route
content:
Race director Vegni defends new-look Strade Bianche and blames faster bikes for carnage: 'This race is not too difficult or too dangerous for real cyclists.'

Read the full article at Crashes, Big-Name Absences Fuel Debate Over Super-Sized Strade Bianche Route on Velo.
author: ahood
